subject: Football (College)
Television
lead_paragraph: Players from Notre Dame have a Showtime crew, which can swell to 50 on game days, recording all the vagaries of their season for the cable series “A Season with Notre Dame.”
snippet: Players from Notre Dame have a Showtime crew, which can swell to 50 on game days, recording all the vagaries of their season for the cable series “A Season with Notre Dame.”
